text: FK Vigør is a Norwegian football club from Hellemyr, Kristiansand. Vigør is the Norwegian name for vigor. The club colors are brown and white, and the club was founded on 5 October 1918. The men's team currently resides in the Third Division, the fourth tier of Norwegian football, having last played in the Second Division in 2000. It contested a playoff to win promotion to the First Division in 1996, but failed. FK Vigør also has a women's section. It fielded a senior team in the league system in 2008, but not in 2009. ==Former players== Many former Vigør players have gone on to play professionally in the Norwegian Premier League or elsewhere. title: FK Vigør
